data.name: AnnieAwards
data.value: The Annie Awards honor excellence in animation across film, television, and other media industries worldwide.

data.name: Bafta
data.value: BAFTA (British Academy of Film and Television Arts) celebrates outstanding achievements in film, television, and games

data.name: CriticsChoiceAwards
data.value: The Critics Choice Awards recognize excellence in film and television, as judged by a group of professional critics.

data.name: CrunchyrollAnimeAwards
data.value: The Crunchyroll Anime Awards celebrate outstanding achievements and creativity in the global anime industry.

data.name: EmmyAwards
data.value: The Emmy Awards honor excellence in the television industry, recognizing outstanding achievements in programming and production.

data.name: Empire
data.value: Empire is a popular British film magazine featuring movie news, reviews, interviews, and industry insights.

data.name: FestivalCannes
data.value: The Cannes Film Festival is an annual event celebrating excellence and innovation in international cinema.

data.name: Filmaffinity
data.value: Filmaffinity is a movie recommendation and review platform where users can rate films and discover personalized suggestions.

data.name: GoldenGlobeAwards
data.value: The Golden Globe Awards recognize outstanding achievements in film and television, presented by the Hollywood Foreign Press Association.

data.name: HighestGrossingMovies
data.value: A collection of movies ranked by their worldwide box office earnings, showcasing the highest-grossing films of all time.

data.name: HollywoodReporter
data.value: The Hollywood Reporter is an entertainment industry magazine covering film, television, and Hollywood news and analysis.

data.name: IMDb
data.value: IMDb is an online database of information related to films, television programs, actors, and entertainment industry professionals.

data.name: JustWatch
data.value: JustWatch is a streaming guide that helps users find where movies and TV shows are available online.

data.name: Metacritic
data.value: Metacritic aggregates reviews from critics and assigns a weighted score to movies, TV shows, games, and music.

data.name: MostExpectedMovies2025
data.value: A collection of the most anticipated movies of 2025, based on buzz, announcements, and audience interest.

data.name: MostExpectedMovies2026
data.value: A collection of the most anticipated movies of 2026, based on early announcements, hype, and fan expectations.

data.name: MudBlazor
data.value: MudBlazor is an open-source UI component library for building modern web applications with Blazor and Material Design.

data.name: Oscar
data.value: The Oscars, or Academy Awards, honor exceptional achievements in the film industry, including acting, directing, and production.

data.name: PeoplesChoiceAwards
data.value: The People’s Choice Awards celebrate popular culture, honoring favorites in movies, TV, music, and digital entertainment as voted by the public.

data.name: RollingStone
data.value: Rolling Stone is a magazine covering music, pop culture, politics, and entertainment news with in-depth reporting and reviews.

data.name: RottenTomatoes
data.value: Rotten Tomatoes aggregates movie and TV reviews to provide audience and critic ratings reflecting overall reception.

data.name: TMDB
data.value: TMDB (The Movie Database) is a community-built database for movies, TV shows, and related metadata and images.

data.name: Trakt
data.value: Trakt is a platform that helps users track, rate, and discover movies and TV shows across multiple devices.

data.name: UpcomingDCMoviesTVShows
data.value: A collection of upcoming DC movies and TV shows, featuring heroes, villains, and stories from the DC Universe.

data.name: UpcomingMarvelMoviesTVShows
data.value: A collection of upcoming Marvel movies and TV shows, continuing the stories of iconic superheroes from the Marvel Universe.

data.name: UpcomingNetflixMovies
data.value: A collection of upcoming Netflix original movies, spanning various genres and featuring global talent and exclusive releases.

data.name: UpcomingStarWarsMoviesTVShows
data.value: A collection of upcoming Star Wars movies and TV shows, expanding the saga with new stories from a galaxy far, far away.

data.name: UpcomingWaltDisneyPictures
data.value: A collection of upcoming films from Walt Disney Pictures, featuring new animated and live-action releases for all audiences.
